column4: Hello. I have successfully installed Lucid Lynx Netbook remix on my eePC. Now I would like to view the "classic" Ubuntu desktop environment, like on the Desktop version. How do I achieve that?
have to install it, ubuntu-desktop also need to set it as the default session if you're automatically logging in, but i dont know the answer to that
No I mean that gui, I don't want the netbook-ish guy
I just want the normal desktop
